Mar 9, 2003

Afghanistan to launch Internet country code

> Afghanistan, where the Internet was banned during the rule of the purist Taliban, will formally inaugurate its .af domain for Afghan Web sites and e-mail addresses on Monday, the United Nations said. Forbes – Reuters

Mar 7, 2003

US claims based on fake documents!

> The head of the U.N. nuclear agency on Friday shot down allegations Iraq tried to revive its nuclear arms program and said fake documents backed U.S. claims Baghdad had tried to buy uranium to make bombs. Reuters Thanks to Atrios!

So the truth is out: George W. Bush lied
